sub_title: Finance & IT Director at Nestlé Health Science Benelux Region
summary:
Business driven financial with a broader view than the function itself. Stimulating growth by strategic, creative and innovative thinking. Always with an eye for people and sustainability. I believe that entrepreneurship and a well-organized route to market are the strongest ingredients to reach organic growth. Always depending on strong & enthusiast people and from an efficient digital environment.

I like to Co-Pilot the business. Not only to report and present the numbers to the stakeholders, but especially to pro-actively working on the targets. To come with all kind of ideas and initiatives, or in the role as sparring partner, to find opportunities to achieve the numbers. Highly focused to improve the business and to bring things to the next level. From optimizing route to markets and systems to creating the right winning atmosphere in the organization.

Coaching the Support Team (Finance, IT) is always on personal development and with the focus on Business Excellence. Make sure that Business Teams have more available time to drive more business. All based on a reliable Finance & Control environment that meets the internal group and statutory requirements.

profile_positions.description:
Responsible Head of Finance of the Commercial Division in the Benelux Region, a fast growing division in Consumer Care (Vitamins, Minerals & Supplements) and Medical Nutrition (Allergies, Enteral & Malnutrition) from strong organic growth and new brand launches.

- Stimulate organic growth from category focus, entrepreneurship and clear business cases
- Increase profitability from pricing, customer, product and route to market optimization 
- Drive change by taking the lead in sustainability and smart digital & fact-based working
- Coaching a multi-located team during Covid-19. Focus on Business Excellence (Finance, IT)
- Recognized and included in European Talent Program for future leaders
profile_positions.title: Finance & IT Director Benelux Region

profile_positions.description:
Responsible Finance & IT Director of both the Commercial and Supply Chain division in The Netherlands. Legal Finance Director of the business entity and several (European) Financial Holding companies.

- Successful Business Plan to attract more interco business and 'double' the volumes in the factory
- Implemented a complete new cloud-based ERP environment (digital factory, full dashboard)
- Taking the lead in legal integration subjects such as liquidations and new tax & audit structures
profile_positions.title: Finance & IT Director Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
In this role I was responsible for the monthly statutory (IFRS) and management reporting of the business units in The Netherlands, Belgium, Spain, Austria and Germany. I was also able to set first steps in a more Business Controller role for the Factory and the European Export Market.

- Introduced complete new management reports on market and brand level
- Designed a new European management reporting structure and guidance, partly global adopted
- Set up a separate Supply Chain Division and new cost price methodology
- Improved significantly the yearly budget and monthly forecast process
profile_positions.title: Financial Controller Central Europe

profile_positions.description:
As Financial Controller I was working on the statutory environment of the legal business entity in The Netherlands. 

- Finished three year old financial and tax audits with complete new audit files
- Trained the accounting team to succeed future audits and to improve month-end closing
- Implemented statutory and management group reporting in Hyperion and become Super User
- Improved significantly daily controlling tasks on salary, pension, cash flow and other analysis
profile_positions.title: Financial Controller Netherlands

profile_positions.description: As Senior Associate I was the more experienced team member on the audit engagements. Besides performing audit work on a higher level I was in this role responsible for determining the audit approach, planning and monitoring the audit, coaching less experienced colleagues and preparing audit deliverables such as the management letter and the audit report. During my time at PwC a learned a lot from all the different organizations and the great mix of experienced and young professionals around me.
profile_positions.title: Senior Associate

profile_positions.description: My role as Associate was to perform audit work on financial statements and other audit related statements of organizations within the public sector and private companies. In addition to the substantive test work, the audits were focused on internal controls in order to identify deficiencies and improvements in the internal control environment of our clients.
profile_positions.title: Associate

profile_positions.description: During my study Accountancy (BSc) I had in 2008 and 2009 two internships of each five months at PwC to develop basic skills around performing audit work on financial statements. In addition, I wrote my bachelor thesis for a client of PwC.
profile_positions.title: Trainee
